SEARCH

Class Vending

java.lang.Object
AbstractVending
Vending
public class Vending extends AbstractVending
This interacts with the vending view class and gives the values for it to print. It also performs various methods that refer to the action of the vending machine. It inherits the attributes and methods of the AbstractVending class. It contains the variable created as an attribute which represents the boolean if whether the machine is created.
